tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Praveen is very thorough and takes his job seriously as one should compared to big chains and clinics I've experienced in Hyderabad. He explains the problem, procedure in depth and with patience and is also equally skillful in performing those surgeries.
He has been my go to dentist since 4 years and I recommend him to my family and friends constantly for any dental consultation or issues too. Thank you for taking so good care!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I was searching for full mouth implant treatment  for my senior citizen parents close to my area and I came across Jodent.  I had absolutely no clue on how this treatment is undergone and Dr. Praveen explained very well initially and made me comfortable. It almost took close to 5-6 months to complete the entire treatment. Dr. Praveen was never in hurry and he took a good time to let my parents settle after every surgical process. The appointments were quite well planned and precautions during this covid time were also observed greatly.  He never was behind the money unlike other clinics but made sure the treatment goes well and patient satisfaction he kept as a primary goal. Always provided the right suggestions when we were worried after the surgical treatment. 

Both my mother and father are satisfied and very happy with the implants. Although they cannot speak local language they both were never hesitant to visit the clinic alone. Doctor made sure they are still comfortable. 

Only some of improvements i would suggest mainly during the surgical process.  Below are improvement around the surgical procedure.
1. Getting the X-rays was a big time struggle for both my parents though my mother had gaggling issue.  So some alternative which can be improvised and make the process little easier.

2. There was a little more time taken during first treatment to find the right size of implant however was already improvised with the subsequent appointments.
3. Try and avoid to keep longer threads after the stitches. Also if the x-ray chip can be cleaned a little more frequently before taking x-ray. I know sometimes its difficult to do that but just a suggestion. 

4. Only one instance which really worried me was the one when there was already an implant placed and was plucked hard and the other one was placed in. There was a lot of bleeding for my mother. Though Doctor Praveen again gave the right suggestions and that reduced the worry and at the end was all fine. 
It was a long journey of treatment as both my mother and father were getting treated. Overall an experience with Dr Praveen and the entire staff was very pleasing and satisfying. I would definitely recommend Doctor Praveen the way he treats and make his patients comfortable. 
My parents have the same say as well. :)
reply_text: Thank you sir for your valuable feedback we will definitely look into the suggestions which were provided that's very helpful for me

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Wisdom Tooth Extraction,Dental Checkup (General),Scaling / Polishing,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Fillings,
review:
Taken treatment recently at JODENT. Initially, we were apprehensive about dental treatment, due to our previous experiences with dentists. However, the first meeting with Dr.Praveen Kumar sir is quite reassuring and all our doubts/fears are cleared. Dr.Praveen Kumar is an expert in the field and is friendly, Soft spoken and makes the patients comfortable with his Compassion. He is leading a Professional, Friendly, and  Highly Skilled Team of Doctors. 
Our whole family had our dental issues sorted out here. We are attended by Dr.Praveen Kumar, Dr.Sowjanya and Dr.Gowthami during our treatment i.e., Wisdom Teeth Extraction, Root Canal Treatment, Scaling, Polishing, Capping and other issues. 
They did an EXCELLENT and AWESOME JOB. We are quite happy with the PAINLESS treatment and the care taken by them. They are all so friendly, helpful, compassionate and gave detailed information about the problem, cause of the problem, treatment being done and future care etc. And the treatment charges are MINIMAL and  MODERATE when compared to other Super Speciality Hospitals. Front office is Ably managed by one Mr.Prashanth who has coordinated our Appointments during our treatment. 
We never imagined that a visit to Dentist will be so PLEASANT. After comparing our experience with our relatives and local Contacts we can confidently say that JODENT is the BEST PATIENT FRIENDLY DENTAL HOSPITAL in Hyderabad.  Thank you Dr.Praveen Kumar sir, Dr.Sowjanya madam and Dr.Gowthami Madamüôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Underwent treatment at JODENT for braces, the treatment is super effective Dr.Praveen and his associate doctor and staff are super friendly and very professional, dedicated, thoughtful and compassionate made me feel so comfort and safe

The compassion with which you treat the patients is more effective than any medicine, the hospital environment has always made me nervous but Dr Praveen and his associates doctor and staff made it bearable Thank you for all your service, support during the treatment and dedication and skill over the past 1year

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: First of all am very very thankful to doctor Praveen, my kid and I visited him for some teeth problem. My kid has minor cavity problem. He clearly explained what r the causes, problem s and solution to us. Though no treatment needed, he suggested few home remidies to cure it inptite of any other treatment. Dr Praveen has lot of patience and gud friendly nature with the ppl visited. And it will really help us in all aspects. After that I had gone through scaling, he did it in a smooth way and he is expert too. Thank you Dr Praveen. And thanks from my wife too.
reply_text: Thanks a lot sir i appreciate your efforts for the feedback.

review:
